titleStmt.title: The Citie of London reproved for its abominations, which doth concern all the inhabitants thereof that are guilty.
titleStmt.author: Fox, Margaret Askew Fell, 1614-1702.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: London, the 4th day of the 5th month, 1660. M.F., i.e. Margaret Fell.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
